data.what_is:
EQUP is an all-in-one software that helps business owners in streamlining their businesses process like marketing, sales, billing, communication, etc. With EQUP, business owners do not have to settle for generic solutions; it offers industry-specific solutions to their business problems whether they are in Service, SAAS, or E-commerce industries.

EQUP is the only CRM+Marketing Automation software present in the market that offers you the option to manage multiple companies with a single account and a single subscription. No need to purchase a new plan to manage your other businesses. EQUP's inventory pooling feature allows you to pool your Emails, Users, Deals, Tags, Tasks, Appointments, etc. between your companies so that no feature is left unused. 

In EQUP, all the tools you need to manage and grow your business are all available in one place, making it easier for you to manage your business without having to learn multiple programs and switching between them for necessary information.

You will also have access to a dedicated account manager who will not only help you with onboarding but will also be available to assist you with your software needs.
data.product_description:
EQUP is an all-in-one CRM tool that streamlines the sales process while managing your company's operations and data. It offers CRM software that is affordable and brimming with practical extras. It is a program that can be used by all types of businesses, needs, and industries. Users have wonderful experiences using it thanks to its robust functions, pre-built templates, and campaigns.
After two decades in this industry, EQUP is aware of the problems that businesses face. CRM should establish and maintain relationships with prospects in addition to managing relationships with current customers.
When you hear that CRM implementation is expensive and make the same assumption, you are acting incorrectly. You get free access to EQUP's tools for promoting customer service, sales, and marketing.

pricing_plans.plan_description: Best for starters, usually single owners who are starting their business part time.

Suitable for small and medium businesses to manage 2 companies. 
(Billed Annually)
plan_features: All in Free Sales CRM features, Plus
Booking - To sell your services and take booking online.
Payment Gateway Integration - To get paid online.
Personal Inbox with  option to integrate Gmail or Outlook or SMTP/IMAP

pricing_plans.plan_description: Suitable for Enterprise businesses to manage 3 companies(Billed Annually)
plan_features: All in Small/Medium Sales CRM features, Plus

pricing_plans.plan_description: Best for starters, usually single owners who are starting their business part-time.(Billed Annually)
plan_features: Social Media Marketing(Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter) - 1 Account Each

pricing_plans.plan_description: Suitable for small and medium businesses to manage 2 companies.(Billed Annually)
plan_features: Social Media Marketing(Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter) - 5 Account Each

pricing_plans.plan_description: Suitable for Enterprise businesses to manage 3 companies. (Billed Annually)
plan_features: Social Media Marketing(Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter) - 10 Account Each

pricing_plans.plan_description: Best for starters, usually single owners who are starting their business part-time.
Best for Startups with a small team(Billed Annually)
plan_features: All in Free - All in One features, Plus
Personal Inbox with option to integrate Gmail or Outlook or SMTP/IMAP
Social Media Marketing(Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter) - 1 Account Each
Payment Gateway Integration - To get paid online.

pricing_plans.plan_description: Suitable for small and medium businesses to manage 3 companies. (Billed Annually)
plan_features: All in Startups - All in One features, Plus
Social Media Marketing(Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter) - 15 Account Each

pricing_plans.plan_description: Suitable for Enterprise businesses to manage upto 5 companies(Billed Annually)
plan_features: All in Startups - All in One features, Plus
Social Media Marketing(Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter) - 25 Account Each

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EQUP?
obviously the best part of equp is working with good people who understands you and will not give a no for an answer. they try to help solve your problem.

What do you dislike about EQUP?
limited used of deals, but equp manager promised that the deals will improve by time as it is work in progress.

What problems is EQUP solving and how is that benefiting you?
currently I am using equp to streamline job request, quoting, execution and invoicing. I want to use equp for field service management aswell, or else integrating with an FMS.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about EQUP?

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about EQUP?
The email and text features. I also like the customer service and account team.

What do you dislike about EQUP?
I greatly like the software and recommend it to all of my associates.

What problems is EQUP solving and how is that benefiting you?
This is great software for marketing and tracking my clients and leads.
